titleStmt.title: Solomons recantation, entituled Ecclesiastes, paraphrased. With a soliloquie or meditation upon every chapter. / By Francis Quarles. Opus posthumum. Never before printed. With a short relation of his life and death.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
Quarles, Ursula, b. 1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Angel in Ivie-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: "A short relation of the life and death of Mr. Francis Quarles" is by Ursula Quarles, his widow.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Angel in Ivie-Lane.
